entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
